column24: FH-2/FH-3 were mother/daughter. Supports bike lanes a lot, but implementation in Berkeley is causing traffic problem - says it should be like Emeryville. NO ICE, but says eyes-on-the-ground police officers are necessary. Commented the toy store we were standing in-front of almost closed, but luckily someone bought it.
FH-2/FH-3 were mother/daughter. Relatively quiet, and filled out her survey differently from her mother (e.g. disagreed on more policing)

Was just visiting the area with a friend but lives in upper rockridge. Was mainly concerned with liter and illegal dumping. Said she supported bike lane projects but HATES the bike lanes on Telegraph and wants them GONE!
Lives in Emeryville and contrasted her level of safety there with that of Oakland. Wants to see larger police presence to keep order.
